errors.error_description: The steps are in the wrong logical order. The `pip install` command is executed from the parent directory before changing into the newly cloned `taipy-core` directory, so it will fail to find `requirements.txt`.
correction_candidates: Move the `cd taipy-core` command to be before the `pip install` command.
Change the pip command to `pip install -r taipy-core/requirements.txt` to specify the correct path.
Combine the first two steps: `git clone https://github.com/Avaiga/taipy-core.git && cd taipy-core`.
Run the command with sudo: `sudo pip install -requirement requirements.txt`.
errors.golden_answer: Move the `cd taipy-core` command to be before the `pip install` command.
